section.p: You learn that a great wizard called Targdaz the Magnificent is imprisoned within the citadel. A necromancer called Shazir from ‘the lands of the southern devils’, as the shaman puts it, inhabits the citadel now. He forces Targdaz to do his bidding.
‘It is known that Targdaz has promised a great reward to any who can free him,’ says the shaman. With that he falls silent, indicating that the audience is at an end.
